attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Government does nothing but leach money from the people of this country.
You are now persecuting us for using vehicles which we need to get to and from work to make a living. You have instantly choosen road pricing as a method of income and a method of spying on people. You are Intentionally turning the UK into a Police State , infringing everyone's privacy. You also seek to suck every penny you can out of the Decent hard working people of this country and ITS NOT ON! Which is Why we the under-signed demand this treacherous move be dropped immediately! Over 1.000.000 People signed the previous petition , yet you go ahead with it anyway. This is The Government's idea of Democracy? idea of Democracy? Dont listen to the people who voted you in? thanks for ruining this great country!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
